title: India vs Sri Lanka live telecast: When and where to watch Rohit Sharma & Co in the final ODI
description: India is set to end the Sri Lanka tour with Charith Asalanka & Co in the final One Day International (ODI) match. The hosts are leading the series 1-0 and one match drawn. India aims to end the series on a high and not break an unwanted record of not losing a series against Sri Lanka in 27 years. A faltered batting line-up has raised concerns, as India couldn't chase 230 and 240 in the first and second games respectively. Sri Lankan spinners, particularly Jeffrey Vandersay, have outclassed Indian batsmen at 208.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
